WorkItem.ClosedComment: Drop-to-drop these were inconsistently documented, but we've added a doc in the final release around this.
WorkItem.Description:
There were a few breaking changes introduced in PRISM V2 D2 (Desktop). The modularity classes including the IModuleInfo interface were changed and the ModuleInfo class was replaced with FileModuleInfo and StaticModuleInfo. Could you please mention these breaking changes in your release notes next time?
Â 
Thanks in advance.
WorkItem.Summary: Breaking changes in PRISM V2 D2
